author: Animalogic
description:
The blue whale is the largest animal ever. When you think about it, what are the odds that we would live at the same time as this gigantic whale? Giants have roamed this Earth for hundreds of millions of years, but they never reach these gigantic sizes. But why? What makes the blue whale so special that it can grow to sizes never seen before? This is the amazing biology of the blue whale.

Get your copy of "Strange Creatures" now! It’s filled with all the amazing animal facts and beautiful original illustrations that you’ve come to love from us. 📗🐾 Order here: http://bit.ly/animalogicbook
